decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (HR-06-01-PL-01, Received: 21/03/2017. HR-06-01-PL-02A, Received: 24/05/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension with two front roof windows to the house and demolition of part of the single storey rear extension
